Language.Text:
Your mission is to escort %escortName% to %destName%.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

The abbess greets you:
"Welcome, pilgrim! Your exploits are known to us, and we take pride in your strength. If you're willing, we could use that strength now."

"A sickness has broken out on %destName%, and we wish to send a medical team to help. But the skies are filled with danger and we need someone to escort our ship to its destination.
"Will you help us?"
"Thank you, pilgrim! Domina is truly in your heart."

The abbess looks disappointed.
"I understand: An escort mission will not further your quest. But helping others is part of Domina's plan too."

The abbess looks confused.
"Why have you abandoned your charge? That medical ship is counting on your protection!"

The abbess smiles:
"Your power are great indeed, pilgrim! We thank you for your efforts.
"We have deposited %reward% in the Pilgrims' Aid fund in your name."

You find the abbess praying in the sanctum.
"Such horror! My heart bleeds for those lost. I hope they find peace with Domina."
